channel.title: Closed* Lock*
channel.description: [center][size=24pt]Eclipse-Rsps[/size][/center] [size=8pt]As some of you may know, my last few releases have been apart of the Eclipse-Rsps PvP series. This version however will not be released to the public. I am going to put this online just to see how far it can go ( goal is to have 30 online at one time ). Yes this sounds like a simple goal but i will not be paying for hosting/advertisement. [/size] [size=24pt]The Reason Why[/size] [size=8pt]I am putting this server online because i see to many server's these days that are "pk servers". Back in maybe 2009 or 2008 the deffinition of a pking server was that you PK for your items and that Player Killing was a big part of the server, but that doesnt mean spawn every item and the only thing you can do is PK. I have made the server based on Pking and Skilling for ECP Points. Everytime you level up in a skilling skill ( minning, cooking, fishing, woodcutting, ect. ) you gain 1 ECP. The rates on these skills are 2 though, so it should take fairly long to get a 99 skill. ( roughly 3 hours ). [/size] [size=24pt]The Team Needed[/size] [size=8pt]I will be needing 1.Website Developer 0/1 2.Hoster 1/1 ~Application~ [code]How Old Are You?: What time zone are you in?: How long can you be on each day?: Are you familiar with PI?: (hoster) How long can you have the server online per day?: (website Dev) How often can you update the site?:[/code][/size]

item.title: Closed* Lock*
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“eclipse rsps, post:3, topic:451267”][quote author=ox random xi link=topic=554157.msg4058817#msg4058817 date=1343251300]

The rates on these skills are 2 though, so it should take fairly long to get a 99 skill. ( roughly 3 hours ). [/size]

I lol’d. 3 hours is long?
[/quote]
Longer than most servers, ya. If it were any longer people wouldn’t try.[/quote]

This is simply not true. Also:

  1. You aren’t paying for Domain/Hosting/V.P.S?
  2. 3 hours per 99 Skill?
  3. ECP? Eclipse Points? I was hoping you’d do something original with a Point system instead of
    just doing what Soulsplit and other servers do.

Read full topic

item.title: Closed* Lock*
item.dc:creator: @ox_random_xi ox random xi
item.description:
@ox_random_xi wrote:

[quote=“eclipse rsps, post:3, topic:451267”][quote author=ox random xi link=topic=554157.msg4058817#msg4058817 date=1343251300]

The rates on these skills are 2 though, so it should take fairly long to get a 99 skill. ( roughly 3 hours ). [/size]

I lol’d. 3 hours is long?
[/quote]
Longer than most servers, ya. If it were any longer people wouldn’t try.[/quote]
then you’re clearly not trying to go for a server that is going to stay up.
If 3 hours is one 99, then in one night someone could almost be max combat on your server.

Read full topic

item.title: Closed* Lock*
item.dc:creator: @eclipse_rsps eclipse rsps
item.description:
@eclipse_rsps wrote:

[center][size=24pt]Eclipse-Rsps[/size][/center]
[size=8pt]As some of you may know, my last few releases have been apart of the Eclipse-Rsps PvP series. This version however will not be released to the public. I am going to put this online just to see how far it can go ( goal is to have 30 online at one time ). Yes this sounds like a simple goal but i will not be paying for hosting/advertisement. [/size]
[size=24pt]The Reason Why[/size]
[size=8pt]I am putting this server online because i see to many server’s these days that are “pk servers”. Back in maybe 2009 or 2008 the deffinition of a pking server was that you PK for your items and that Player Killing was a big part of the server, but that doesnt mean spawn every item and the only thing you can do is PK. I have made the server based on Pking and Skilling for ECP Points. Everytime you level up in a skilling skill ( minning, cooking, fishing, woodcutting, ect. ) you gain 1 ECP. The rates on these skills are 2 though, so it should take fairly long to get a 99 skill. ( roughly 3 hours ). [/size]
[size=24pt]The Team Needed[/size]
[size=8pt]I will be needing
1.Website Developer 0/1
2.Hoster 1/1
~Application~

How Old Are You?: What time zone are you in?: How long can you be on each day?: Are you familiar with PI?: (hoster) How long can you have the server online per day?: (website Dev) How often can you update the site?:[/size]
